explains: n. （尤指演奏乐器的）能手，大家

sentences.en: The game was a triumph; the team gave a virtuoso performance.
sentences.cn: 比赛大获全胜；该队表演精彩。

sentences.en: For United, it was a virtuoso performance.
sentences.cn: 对曼联来说，这是一次如艺术家般的表现。

sentences.en: A virtuoso must first be an excellent technician who has made the basic practices habitual.
sentences.cn: 艺术品鉴赏家必须首先成为一名出色的技术师，具备基本的实践习惯。
